The claim fails to consider that the COV: 19 particle is always bonded to larger particles of water, protein, mucus, and other materials expelled by breathing, coughing, etc., which are well above the 0.3 micron size of the N95 filter.
The N95 filter efficiently filters parti: 3 microns because these particles have a high amount of erratic movement and are electrostatically drawn to the mask fibers.
The size: based argument against N95 masks assumes that mask filtering works like water flowing through a net, which is an oversimplified understanding of how viruses behave and how face masks work.
